entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Hello everyone! This is my first blog post in here since I’ve installed Hexo. It’s a pretty cool framework but more into that later.

I’m CaldeiraG, I’m 21 years old and lived all my life in Portugal.

I do full-stack web development for 2 years now but currently expanding my portfolio of languages such as Go and Node.js. I also have some experience with Python, C# and C++.

I can consider myself as a enthusiast among the tech community, making websites for fun, fiddle around with server hardware and more recently a Raspberry Pi and some VPS’es.

I want this blog to serve as a journal of what I’m currently working on/interested in, maybe reviews of products I buy and more. I’m excited to start this blog with some cool content.

If you’re interested to see what I’ve built over the years, you can check out my GitHub here or on the sidebar.

That’s it! Have a good day all :)
